And<S>1161</S> the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> brethren<S>80</S> that were<S>5607</S> in<S>2596</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> had<S>1209</S> also<S>2532</S> received<S>1209</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> Peter<S>4074</S> was come up<S>305</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, they that were of<S>1537</S> the circumcision<S>4061</S> contended<S>1252</S> with<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> Thou wentest in<S>1525</S> to<S>4314</S> men<S>435</S> uncircumcised<S>203</S> <S>2192</S>, and<S>2532</S> didst eat<S>4906</S> with them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> rehearsed the matter from the beginning<S>756</S>, and expounded<S>1620</S> it by order<S>2517</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
I<S>1473</S> was<S>2252</S> in<S>1722</S> the city<S>4172</S> of Joppa<S>2445</S> praying<S>4336</S>: and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> a trance<S>1611</S> I saw<S>1492</S> a vision<S>3705</S>, A certain<S>5100</S> vessel<S>4632</S> descend<S>2597</S>, as it had been<S>5613</S> a great<S>3173</S> sheet<S>3607</S>, let down<S>2524</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> by four<S>5064</S> corners<S>746</S>; and<S>2532</S> it came<S>2064</S> even<S>891</S> to me<S>1700</S>:
Upon<S>1519</S> the which<S>3739</S> when I had fastened mine eyes<S>816</S>, I considered<S>2657</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>1492</S> fourfooted beasts<S>5074</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> wild beasts<S>2342</S>, and<S>2532</S> creeping things<S>2062</S>, and<S>2532</S> fowls<S>4071</S> of the air<S>3772</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I heard<S>191</S> a voice<S>5456</S> saying<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Arise<S>450</S>, Peter<S>4074</S>; slay<S>2380</S> and<S>2532</S> eat<S>5315</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I said<S>2036</S>, Not so<S>3365</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>: for<S>3754</S> nothing<S>3956</S> common<S>2839</S> or<S>2228</S> unclean<S>169</S> hath<S>1525</S> at any time<S>3763</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> my<S>3450</S> mouth<S>4750</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the voice<S>5456</S> answered<S>611</S> me<S>3427</S> again<S>1537</S> <S>1208</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, What<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath cleansed<S>2511</S>, that call<S>2840</S> not<S>3361</S> thou<S>4771</S> common<S>2840</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> was done<S>1096</S> <S>1909</S> three times<S>5151</S>: and<S>2532</S> all<S>537</S> were drawn up<S>385</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, immediately<S>1824</S> there were<S>2186</S> three<S>5140</S> men<S>435</S> already<S>1824</S> come<S>2186</S> unto<S>1909</S> the house<S>3614</S> where<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> <S>3739</S> I was<S>2252</S>, sent<S>649</S> from<S>575</S> Caesarea<S>2542</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> bade<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S> go with<S>4905</S> them<S>846</S>, nothing<S>3367</S> doubting<S>1252</S>. Moreover<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> these<S>3778</S> six<S>1803</S> brethren<S>80</S> accompanied<S>4862</S> <S>2064</S> me<S>1698</S>, and<S>2532</S> we entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the man's<S>435</S> house<S>3624</S>:
And<S>5037</S> he shewed<S>518</S> us<S>2254</S> how<S>4459</S> he had seen<S>1492</S> an angel<S>32</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>, which stood<S>2476</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Send<S>649</S> men<S>435</S> to<S>1519</S> Joppa<S>2445</S>, and<S>2532</S> call for<S>3343</S> Simon<S>4613</S>, whose surname is<S>1941</S> Peter<S>4074</S>;
Who<S>3739</S> shall tell<S>2980</S> thee<S>4314</S> <S>4571</S> words<S>4487</S>, whereby<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> thou<S>4771</S> and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> thy<S>4675</S> house<S>3624</S> shall be saved<S>4982</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as<S>1722</S> I<S>3165</S> began<S>756</S> to speak<S>2980</S>, the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> fell<S>1968</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, as<S>5618</S> <S>2532</S> on<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S> at<S>1722</S> the beginning<S>746</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> remembered I<S>3415</S> the word<S>4487</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, how<S>5613</S> that he said<S>3004</S>, John<S>2491</S> indeed<S>3303</S> baptized<S>907</S> with water<S>5204</S>; but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> shall be baptized<S>907</S> with<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
Forasmuch<S>1487</S> then<S>3767</S> as<S>5613</S> God<S>2316</S> gave<S>1325</S> them<S>846</S> the like<S>2470</S> gift<S>1431</S> as<S>2532</S> he did unto us<S>2254</S>, who believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1909</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>;<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> was<S>2252</S> I<S>1473</S>, that I could<S>1415</S> withstand<S>2967</S> God<S>2316</S>?
When<S>1161</S> they heard<S>191</S> these things<S>5023</S>, they held their peace<S>2270</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorified<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Then<S>686</S> hath<S>1325</S> God<S>2316</S> also<S>2534</S> to the Gentiles<S>1484</S> granted<S>1325</S> repentance<S>3341</S> unto<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>.
Now<S>3767</S> <S>3303</S> they which were scattered abroad<S>1289</S> upon<S>575</S> the persecution<S>2347</S> that arose<S>1096</S> about<S>1909</S> Stephen<S>4736</S> travelled<S>1330</S> as far as<S>2193</S> Phenice<S>5403</S>, and<S>2532</S> Cyprus<S>2954</S>, and<S>2532</S> Antioch<S>490</S>, preaching<S>2980</S> the word<S>3056</S> to none<S>3367</S> but<S>1508</S> unto the Jews<S>2453</S> only<S>3440</S>.
And<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> were<S>2258</S> men<S>435</S> of Cyprus<S>2953</S> and<S>2532</S> Cyrene<S>2956</S>, which<S>3748</S>, when they were come<S>1525</S> to<S>1519</S> Antioch<S>490</S>, spake<S>2980</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Grecians<S>1675</S>, preaching<S>2097</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>5037</S> a great<S>4183</S> number<S>706</S> believed<S>4100</S>, and turned<S>1994</S> unto<S>1909</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> tidings<S>3056</S> of<S>4012</S> these things<S>846</S> came<S>191</S> unto<S>1519</S> the ears<S>3775</S> of the church<S>1577</S> which<S>3588</S> was in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>: and<S>2532</S> they sent forth<S>1821</S> Barnabas<S>921</S>, that he should go<S>1330</S> as far as<S>2193</S> Antioch<S>490</S>.
Who<S>3739</S>, when he came<S>3854</S>, and<S>2532</S> had seen<S>1492</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S>, was glad<S>5463</S>, and<S>2532</S> exhorted<S>3870</S> them all<S>3956</S>, that with purpose<S>4286</S> of heart<S>2588</S> they would cleave unto<S>4357</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
For<S>3754</S> he was<S>2258</S> a good<S>18</S> man<S>435</S>, and<S>2532</S> full<S>4134</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> of faith<S>4102</S>: and<S>2532</S> much<S>2425</S> people<S>3793</S> was added<S>4369</S> unto the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> departed<S>1831</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> to<S>1519</S> Tarsus<S>5019</S>, for to seek<S>327</S> Saul<S>4569</S>:
And<S>2532</S> when he had found<S>2147</S> him<S>846</S>, he brought<S>71</S> him<S>846</S> unto<S>1519</S> Antioch<S>490</S>. And<S>1161</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that a whole<S>3650</S> year<S>1763</S> they<S>846</S> assembled themselves<S>4863</S> with<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S>, and<S>2532</S> taught<S>1321</S> much<S>2425</S> people<S>3793</S>. And<S>5037</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> were called<S>5537</S> Christians<S>5546</S> first<S>4412</S> in<S>1722</S> Antioch<S>490</S>. <sup>with: or, in the church</sup>
And<S>1161</S> in<S>1722</S> these<S>5025</S> days<S>2250</S> came<S>2718</S> prophets<S>4396</S> from<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> unto<S>1519</S> Antioch<S>490</S>.
And<S>1161</S> there stood up<S>450</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> named<S>3686</S> Agabus<S>13</S>, and signified<S>4591</S> by<S>1223</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> that there should be<S>3195</S> <S>1510</S> great<S>3173</S> dearth<S>3042</S> throughout<S>1909</S> all<S>3650</S> the world<S>3625</S>: which<S>3748</S> <S>2532</S> came to pass<S>1096</S> in the days of<S>1909</S> Claudius<S>2804</S> Caesar<S>2541</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> the disciples<S>3101</S>, every<S>1538</S> man<S>846</S> according to<S>2531</S> his ability<S>2141</S> <S>5100</S>, determined<S>3724</S> to send<S>3992</S> relief<S>1248</S> unto<S>1519</S> the brethren<S>80</S> which dwelt<S>2730</S> in<S>1722</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>:
Which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> they did<S>4160</S>, and sent it<S>649</S> to<S>4314</S> the elders<S>4245</S> by<S>1223</S> the hands<S>5495</S> of Barnabas<S>921</S> and<S>2532</S> Saul<S>4569</S>.
